name: Space Lava (Cotton Bull Games)
description:
Space Lava is a "gravity platformer" where you swipe to rotate the screen and control the movement of the ball.

-Reach all the goals without hitting the lava!
-See the path you took at the end of each level
-Chiptunes music by Rolemusic
-Become a gravity expert to complete all 50 levels!

--Originally created for iOS, now available on itch.io
